jetpack-related-posts.title: Our Governors
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: WE ARE DEVELOPING THIS PAGE TO INCLUDE MORE INFORMATION INCLUDING GOVERNOR ROLES AND ATTENDANCE SOON!   Our Governors meet regularly and many visit school during the day to support the work of school leaders or to help in class, during visits or at special events. Three of our Governors are…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Year 3
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Welcome to our Year 3 Class Page! We are the Courageous Captain Moores!   Our teacher is Mr T Venus Our class is supported by Mrs H Kelly and Mrs E Cliffe Our PPA Cover is provided by Mrs R Andrew   Our curriculum is listed below: Long term planning cycle B…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Year 1
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Welcome to our Year 1 Class Page! We are the Excellent Earhearts! We have an exciting curriculum that links the EYFS and the KS1 formal curriculum. During the year children access a range of exciting topics to enthuse and excite them! Our teacher is Mrs N Evans Our class is supported by…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Wellbeing and Modern Foreign Languages (MfL)
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Our wellbeing lead is Mr L McClure. Some resources to support families during the period of school closure: Health team resources and links   We follow a curriculum programme called Jigsaw with significant additional content some of which- especially assembly material- is supplemented by 1Decision online materials and interactive videos.…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Safeguarding
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Here at Springvale Primary we expect every stakeholder to take safety and safeguarding very seriously. We have key policies and systems in place to support our children and to ensure that they can feel safe, supported and happy in our school environment.   We have several child-friendly mechanisms for sharing…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Year 6
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Welcome to our Year 6 Class Page! Welcome to year 6... your last year here at Springvale Primary! Meet the amazing team...Mrs Mayston, Mrs Wildsmith, Mrs Kent, Miss Heeley and Mrs Haigh! We are kind, crazy and fun....especially when you do fantastic work and are super kind to each other! It’s a year…
